title: FS: Low Grade T205 lot with SP's and Graded Cards  **PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Low Grade T205 lot with SP's and Graded Cards  **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards available for sale or trade. Condition should be accurately reflected by the scans.  Please note that the lines that appear on the graded cards are from the scanner, and are NOT on the cards or holders.

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer and will gladly consider trades for anything that I need from any other sets. I collect just about everything. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

CARDS PICTURED:

Barger (partial "B" showing on cap, SP) - **SOLD**
Mattern - $11
Oldring (SGC 30) - **SOLD**
Paskert (SGC 30) - $23
Snodgrass (SGC 30) - $23
Street (PSA 2) - **SOLD**
Sweeney (SP) - $23
Wiltse (right ear shows, SP) - $31
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking.
